Posts.Content: May 16, 2012 06:12AM Calla-Lily wrote: Today is the first day I have been on the boards.  Had a biopsy results on May 7th, IDC. Met with BS yesterday.  Having MX tomorrow on Right.  Things are moving fast, becoming scared as time sails by.  No time to do some of the things listed that should be done like cleaning house big time.   I am going to take a run to the store for some button jammies, like the idea of finding something silky to slide in and out of bed.  No one I spoke to yesterday said anything about cami's and such, so will check these out today.  BS said I would only be in hospital over night then home.  So much to take in...
Posts.Title: May 2012 Mastectomies? Still_Snarky Fearlessfoot

Posts.Content: May 22, 2012 05:54AM Calla-Lily wrote: Thank you for the encouragement.  Surgery was last Thursday.  Will not get results of pathology until Tuesday after Memorial Day.  These dang drains will hopefully come out also when I meet with the surgeon.  I'm not wearing anything, waiting for Rx for mastectomy bras and inserts, needed for Medicare provider.  Will be meeting with Oncologist on Thursday the 31st.  May has been quite a month!   I had an back ache today from sleeping and laying on back.  I used a chair massager this morning laying on the bed.  It was a fabulous!  If you have one of these hanging around your house, try it...you will like-e-e-e it!
Posts.Title: May 2012 Mastectomies? Still_Snarky Fearlessfoot
